      • checkRushOrderSupport

        public void checkRushOrderSupport​(java.util.List<OrderMedia> items,
                                  java.lang.String province)
                           throws RushUnsupportedException
        This method check if an order is supported by rush order and add supported items to a list.
        Parameters:
        items - list of ordered items in the cart
        province - province of delivery.
        Throws:
        RushUnsupportedException - throws when the order is not rush-order-supported.

      • calculateShippingFee

        public int calculateShippingFee​(Order order)
        This method calculates shipping fee, including normal shipping fee and additional rush shipping fee.
        Overrides:
        calculateShippingFee in class PlaceOrderController
        Parameters:
        order - the order to calculate fee
        Returns:
        the total amount of shipping fee
